ml.recommendation

Class FM

  • java.lang.Object
    • ml.recommendation.FM

  • public class FM
extends java.lang.Object
    A Java implementation of factorization machines (FM) by ALS.
    Version:
    1.0 Jan. 14th, 2015
    Author:
    Mingjie Qian

      • AppDirPath

        private static java.lang.String AppDirPath
        File path for the directory where SLFM.jar is located, which will be inferred in runtime.

      • MaxIter

        private static int MaxIter

      • calcOFV

        private static boolean calcOFV

      • p

        private static int p
        Feature size.

      • K

        private static int K
        Dimensionality of the latent space.

      • n

        private static int n
        Data size.

      • b

        private static double b
        Bias.

      • W

        private static DenseVector W
        First order weights. W[j] is the linear weight for feature j.

      • V

        private static DenseVector[] V
        Second order latent vectors. V[f] is the latent vector for the f-th latent dimension.

      • y

        private static int[] y
        Labels.

      • y_hat

        private static double[] y_hat
        y_hat[i] is the predicted value for instance i.

      • e

        private static double[] e
        e[i] = y[i] - y_hat[i].

      • q

        private static double[] q
        q[i] = \sum_j V[j][f] * X[i][j]

      • Q

        private static double[][] Q
        Q[f][i] = \sum_j V[j][f] * X[i][j]

      • X

        private static Matrix X
        n x d data matrix.

      • lambda

        private static double lambda
        Let the data matrix X be an n x p matrix, then XColumns[j] = X[:,j].

      • TestIdx2TrainIdxUserMap

        static java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> TestIdx2TrainIdxUserMap
        Test index: Training index or -1 if is new

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer>> TestUser2EventIndexSetMap
        TestUser2EventIndexSetMap[i] = {indexOf(i, j) | (i, j) \in C}.

      • TestUserIndices

        public static int[] TestUserIndices
        TestUserIndices[k] is the user index for the k-th event.

      • allocateResource

        public static void allocateResource(int K)
        Just need call this method once to allocate required resources. Feature sizes will be set. This method should be called after training data is loaded and K is set.
        Parameters:
        K -

        public static void feedTrainingData(DataSet dataSet)

      • feedTrainingData

        public static void feedTrainingData(java.lang.String trainFilePath)
        Read a data set from a LIBSVM formatted file. Note that an empty string will be viewed as an empty sparse feature vector. Empty sparse vectors commonly occur when a test example only has new features. Note that the default starting index is 0.
        Parameters:
        trainFilePath - file path for the training data

      • feedTrainingData

        public static void feedTrainingData(java.lang.String trainFilePath,
                    int idxStart)
        Read a data set from a LIBSVM formatted file. Note that an empty string will be viewed as an empty sparse feature vector. Empty sparse vectors commonly occur when a test example only has new features.
        Parameters:
        trainFilePath - file path for the training data
        idxStart - starting index
